card.name: Captain America
card.property: "I Can Do This All Day!" â€” Action: Discard 1 card from your hand â†’ ready Captain America. (Limit once per round.)
"My duty to my country comes first, no matter the cost!"

alternate.name: Steve Rogers
alternate.property: Living Legend â€” Reduce the cost of the first ally played each round by 1. Setup: Search your deck and discard pile for the Captain America's Shield upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Agent 13
card.property: Response: After Agent 13 enters play, remove 2 threat from a scheme.
"Cap, you said we'd fight as a team! I want to come with you!"

card.name: Fearless Determination
card.property: Hero Action: Captain America gets +1 THW until the end of the phase. Draw 1 card.
"No one dies on my watch." -- Captain America

card.name: Heroic Strike
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, stun that enemy.
"No, you move." -- Captain America

card.name: Shield Block
card.property: Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, exhaust Captain America's Shield â†’ prevent all of that damage.
"Is that all you've got?" -- Captain America

card.name: Shield Toss
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Discard X cards from your hand, then return Captain America's Shield from play to your hand â†’ deal 4 damage to X enemies.
"Sharon! Duck!" -- Captain America

card.name: Steve's Apartment
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Steve's Apartment â†’ draw 1 card and heal 1 damage from Steve Rogers.
Even Captain America needs a place to get away and rest.

card.name: Captain America's Helmet
card.property: Interrupt: When Captain America would be defeated, set his hit point dial to 1 instead. Then, discard this card.
"A soldier, even a super-soldier, is only as strong as his ideals." -- Steve Rogers

card.name: Captain America's Shield
card.property: Restricted. (Max 2 restricted cards per player.) Captain America gets +1 DEF and gains retaliate 1.
"This shield is a symbol of freedom." -- Captain America

card.name: Super-Soldier Serum
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Super-Soldier Serum â†’ generate a [physical] resource.
"The serum gave Cap his super-strength. But his heart, his unrelenting determination -- those were Steve's long before he picked up the shield." -- Sharon Carter

card.name: Falcon
card.property: Response: After Falcon enters play, look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each treachery looked at this way, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Squirrel Girl
card.property: Response: After Squirrel Girl enters play, deal 1 damage to each enemy.
Come on squirrels, let's get 'im!.

card.name: Wonder Man
card.property: As an additional cost for Wonder Man to attack, you must discard 1 card from your hand.
It's time for a reckoning!.

card.name: Avengers Assemble!
card.property: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Ready each [[Avenger]] character you control. Until the end of the phase, each [[Avenger]] character in play gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.

card.name: Strength In Numbers
card.property: Action: Exhaust any number of allies you control â†’ draw 1 card for each ally exhausted this way.
"Good thing I brought friends." -- Captain America

card.name: Quinjet
card.property: Response: After your turn begins, place 1 time counter on Quinjet. Action: Put an [[Avenger]] ally from your hand into play with printed cost equal to or less than the number of time counters on Quinjet. Then, discard Quinjet.

card.name: Avengers Tower
card.property: If each of your allies has the [[Avenger]] trait, increase your ally limit by 1. Action: Exhaust Avengers Tower â†’ reduce the cost of the next [[Avenger]] ally played this phase by 1.

card.name: Honorary Avenger
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait. Attach to a friendly character. Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[Avenger]] trait.

card.name: Enraged
card.property: Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gets +2 ATK and takes +1 consequential damage after it attacks.
"Should I be worried about him?" -- Spider-Man

card.name: Followed
card.property: Attach to a side scheme. Max 1 per scheme. Response: When attached scheme is defeated, deal 4 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Expert Defense
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +3 DEF for that attack.
"Do these guys ever run out of ammo!" -- Captain America

card.name: Enhanced Awareness
card.property: Uses (3 mental counters). Hero Resource: Exhaust Enhanced Awareness and remove 1 mental counter from it â†’ generate a [mental] resource.

card.name: Man Out of Time
card.property: Give to the Steve Rogers player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Steve Rogers â†’ remove Man Out of Time from the game. - Discard half of the cards in your hand, rounded down. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Hit Squad
card.property: When Revealed: In player order, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck and takes 1 damage for each boost icon discarded this way.
Baron Zemo leads a Hydra taskforce into the city to hunt down Avengers.

card.name: Baron Zemo
card.property: Quickstrike. While Baron Zemo is engaged with you, you cannot thwart. (Captain America's nemesis minion.)
"To avenge my father, Captain America must die."

card.name: Hydra Soldier
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

card.name: Hail Hydra!
card.property: When Revealed: Each [[Hydra]] minion engaged with a hero attacks that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hydra]] minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched.
